name: Welcome to the Garden
description:
A light hearted farming simulator featuring Ichika Maia and friends.

Developed over the course of Oct 19, 2021 to Nov 16, 2021 in celebration of Maia's birthday

Controls Keyboard
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move and navigate the UI
  • Tab to switch tools and tabbed menus
  • Space to accept/interact
  • Escape to cancel
  • Enter to open your journal
Gamepad (not available in Web version)
  • D-Pad and Analog Stick both work for movement and menus
  • L1/LB and R1/RB to switch tools and tabbed menus
  • A/Cross to accept/interact
  • B/Circle to cancel
  • Y/Triangle to open your journal

If you like the game and would like to show your appreciation, donations are accepted through https://streamelements.com/erodozer/tip
